item.title: The Code Review Cupid
item.description: CW22 - 2022-04-04 **Collaborative Ideas session group: The **Code Review Cupid (H-Heather) [from the clipart library] Participants Sherman Lo / RSE, Queen Mary, University of London/ London / s.lo@qmul.ac.uk / Twitter @shermanlo77 / Github @shermanlo77 Matthew Alexandrakis, RSE Queen Mary University of London, m.alexandrakis@qmul.ac.uk Dmitry Nikolaenko, RSE / Durham University, dmitry.nikolaenko@durham.ac.uk Felicity Anderson, EPCC PhD Researcher, University of Edinburgh, Felicity.Anderson@ed.ac.uk Matthew Bluteau, RSE at UK Atomic Energy Authority, matthew.bluteau@ukaea.uk Mario Antonioletti, EPCC/SSI University of Edinburgh, mario@epcc.
